Plot: A tale of greed and corruption. Santa is in trouble, he's out of step with the modern consumer and has been tricked into relocating from the North Pole in an effort to modernise Christmas. But unbeknown to him, World powers are conspiring to steal his magic and take over Christmas for their own ends. There are elves, suffragettes, reindeer, sleighs, tinsel and bells, energy drink and murder!
